disobedience.description: Rejecting Church unity due to frustration with individuals is sinful because it confuses the Church's divine nature and eternal truths with the human imperfections of its members, while also violating Christ's prayer "that they may all be one."

disobedience.question: Did you mock the Church in your words or actions?
disobedience.description: Mocking the church shows contempt for Christ's established institution on earth, disrespects the Body of Christ, and undermines the Church's divine authority as guided by the Holy Spirit.

disobedience.question: Did I engage in work on Sunday when it could have been avoided, thereby disrespecting the Lord's day of rest?

greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

greed.question: Have I made the accumulation of wealth and possessions an ultimate goal in my life?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

extracted_data_phrases: rather than seeing them in their full humanity
lust.question: Did I reduce others to their usefulness, rather than seeing them in their full humanity?
lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

extracted_data_phrases: rather than seeing them as individuals with inherent dignity

rather than respecting their inherent dignity and worth
lust.question: Did I view others primarily in terms of their usefulness to me, rather than respecting their inherent dignity and worth?
lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the good things in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the blessings in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: such as enjoying hobbies like woodworking and gardening , solely to my own abilities
autonomy.question: Did I attribute my accomplishments, such as enjoying hobbies like woodworking and gardening, solely to my own abilities, forgetting to acknowledge God's providence in my life?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I secretly wished others would lose their material possessions, causing me to feel envious of what they have?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or inappropriate language, thereby showing a lack of self-restraint and violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in a manner that dishonored their dignity through my words
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others in a manner that dishonored their dignity through my words?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: especially during social gatherings or times of celebration
gluttony.question: Did I give in to excess in eating or drinking, especially during social gatherings or times of celebration?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing private matters about others, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private matters about acquaintances, even if what was shared was true?

anger.question: Have I nursed anger within myself rather than seeking peace and reconciliation, thereby causing harm to my relationships?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
